GET
/v1/groups/:group_id/vendors
This will return all the groups vendors
GET
/v1/groups/:group_id/vendors/:id
This will get the vendor matching with the :group_id and :id given
POST
/v1/groups/:group_id/vendors
This create a new vendor for the group matching :group_id
And a reply with the new vendor object
PUT
/v1/groups/:group_id/vendors/:id
This update the vendor matching :group_id and :id
And a reply with the updated vendor object
DELETE
/v1/groups/:group_id/vendors/:id
This will delete the vendor with matching :group_id and :id and reply with the deleted vendor object
